Items.Title: Oversight - Renewable Rikers
Items.ActionText: This Oversight was Hearing Held by Committee

Items.Title: A Local Law in relation to conducting a study regarding the feasibility of constructing a new wastewater treatment facility on Rikers Island
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Conducting a study regarding the feasibility of constructing a new wastewater treatment facility on Rikers Island.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to the transfer of land, buildings and facilities of Rikers Island to the department of citywide administrative services
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Transfer of land, buildings and facilities of Rikers Island to the dept of citywide administrative services.

Items.Title: A Local Law to direct the mayor’s office of long-term planning and sustainability to study the feasibility of different types of renewable energy sources combined with battery storage on Rikers Island.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Direct the mayor’s office of long-term planning and sustainability to study the feasibility of different types of renewable energy sources combined with battery storage on Rikers Island.

Items.MinutesNote: Other Council Members Attending:  Speaker Johnson, Vallone, Powers, Salamanca and Perkins
